lov_lock_link Struct Reference
[lov]

A link between a top-lock and a sub-lock. More...

#include <lov_cl_internal.h>

Data Fields

struct lov_lock * lll_super
int lll_idx
 An index within parent lock.
struct list_head lll_list
 A linkage into per sub-lock list of all corresponding top-locks, hanging off lovsub_lock::lss_parents.

Detailed Description

A link between a top-lock and a sub-lock.

Separate data-structure is necessary, because top-locks and sub-locks are in M:N relationship.

Todo:
This can be optimized for a (by far) most frequent case of a single top-lock per sub-lock.
